title: India's Heartbreak: A Story of Near Misses and Missed Opportunities at the 2022 Women's Cricket World Cup
content:
India's journey at the 2022 ICC Women's Cricket World Cup was a rollercoaster of near misses and missed opportunities.  They were a team of  **contradictions:**  topping the six-hitting charts while also conceding the least extras.  They had moments of brilliance, like Harmanpreet Kaur's all-round heroics against South Africa, but ultimately, they couldn't overcome crucial mistakes. 

The **India vs South Africa match** was a heart-wrenching climax, where a crucial no ball changed the course of the game and sent India packing. The **South Africa win**  sent the West Indies into the semi-finals.  While India had some statistical successes, they didn't make the cut for the **semi-finals**, ending their campaign with a **heartbreaking end** to a **strange old campaign.**
author: Vinayakk Mohanarangan
